content.rendered:
EVENT COORDINATOR

A self-described army brat, Keara grew up traveling the U.S. and living in several states with her family. She attended California University of Pennsylvania and graduated with a Bachelor's of Science in event planning and management.

She always had a passion for events! As a kid, she was always the planner of her friend group who turned all of their ideas into reality. When going off to college, she decided to major in event planning and started her career working with a wedding planning company in Boston (go Pats!). She then jumped into the other side of the event world and started working for a corporate group for a couple years. This is when she realized her passion is in the social side of events and helping couples bring their wedding visions to life!

Outside of work, Keara enjoys traveling the world, exploring new coffee shops, reading the latest psychological thrillers, and going to sports games.
